ruleEntry.formula: AND ( OR ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadAutomationQualified, TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadHandRaise, AND ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadStatusNew, TEXT ( LeadSource ) == $Label.LeadSourceCSGenerated ) ), OR( Country = 'China', Country = 'Hong Kong', Country = 'Macau', Country = 'Taiwan', Country = 'CN' ) )

AND ( OR ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadAutomationQualified, TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadHandRaise, AND ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadStatusNew, TEXT ( LeadSource ) == $Label.LeadSourceCSGenerated ) ), Country = 'Japan' )

AND ( OR ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadAutomationQualified, TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadHandRaise, AND ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadStatusNew, TEXT ( LeadSource ) == $Label.LeadSourceCSGenerated ) ), OR( Country = 'Afghanistan', Country = 'Algeria', Country = 'Angola', Country = 'Armenia', Country = 'Australia', Country = 'Azerbaijan', Country = 'Bahrain', Country = 'Bangladesh', Country = 'Belarus', Country = 'Benin', Country = 'Bhutan', Country = 'Botswana', Country = 'Brunei Darussalam', Country = 'Burkina Faso', Country = 'Burundi', Country = 'Cambodia', Country = 'Cameroon', Country = 'Cape Verde', Country = 'Central African Republic', Country = 'Chad', Country = 'Christmas Islnd', Country = 'Comoros', Country = 'Cook Islands', Country = 'Democratic Republic of the Congo', Country = 'Djibouti', Country = 'Egypt', Country = 'Equatorial Guinea', Country = 'Eritrea', Country = 'Ethiopia', Country = 'Fiji', Country = 'French Polynesia', Country = 'Gabon', Country = 'Gambia', Country = 'Ghana', Country = 'Guinea', Country = 'Guinea-Bissau', Country = 'Heard and McDonald Islands', Country = 'India', Country = 'Indonesia', Country = 'Iran', Country = 'Iraq', Country = 'Jordan', Country = 'Kazakhstan', Country = 'Kenya', Country = 'Kiribati', Country = 'Kuwait', Country = 'Kyrgyzstan', Country = 'Laos', Country = 'Lebanon', Country = 'Lesotho', Country = 'Liberia', Country = 'Libya', Country = 'Madagascar', Country = 'Malawi', Country = 'Malaysia', Country = 'Maldives', Country = 'Mali', Country = 'Marshall Islands', Country = 'Mauretania', Country = 'Mauritius', Country = 'Mayotte', Country = 'Micronesia', AND(CONTAINS(Country, 'Cote d'),CONTAINS(Country, 'Ivoire'))) )

AND ( OR ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadAutomationQualified, TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadHandRaise, AND ( TEXT ( Status ) == $Label.LeadStatusNew, TEXT ( LeadSource ) == $Label.LeadSourceCSGenerated ) ), OR( Country = 'Anguilla', Country = 'Antigua and Barbuda', Country = 'Aruba', Country = 'Bahamas', Country = 'Barbados', Country = 'Bermuda', Country = 'British Virgin Islands', Country = 'Cayman Islands', Country = 'Cuba', Country = 'Dominica', Country = 'Dominican Republic', Country = 'Grenada', Country = 'Guadeloupe', Country = 'Haiti', Country = 'Jamaica', Country = 'Martinique', Country = 'Montserrat', Country = 'Saint Kitts and Nevis', Country = 'Saint Lucia', Country = 'Saint Vincent & the Grenadines', Country = 'Trinidad and Tobago', Country = 'Turks and Caicos Islands', Country = 'Antarctica', Country = 'Argentina', Country = 'Belize', Country = 'Bolivia', Country = 'Brazil', Country = 'Chile', Country = 'Cocos Keeling', Country = 'Colombia', Country = 'Costa Rica', Country = 'Ecuador', Country = 'El Salvador', Country = 'Falkland Islands', Country = 'French Guiana', Country = 'Guatemala', Country = 'Guyana', Country = 'Honduras', Country = 'Mexico', Country = 'Nicaragua', Country = 'Panama', Country = 'Paraguay', Country = 'Peru', Country = 'S. Georgia and S. Sandwich Isls.', Country = 'Suriname', Country = 'Uruguay', Country = 'Venezuela', Country = 'CA', Country = 'Canada', Country = 'Greenland', Country = 'St. Pierre and Miquelon', CONTAINS(Country ,'Sandwich'), Country = 'US', Country = 'USA' ) )
